stimulusHtml:
The New Orleans Museum of Art: Museum purchase and Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Q. Davis and the Stern Fund, 74.278

The painting shown can be attributed to the Master of Calamarca (La Paz School) because of its representation of
choicesHtml: a dense network of hidden symbolism
a form of applied enconchado decoration
an angel in the dress of an Andean nobleman
a winged figure in the uniform of a Dutch soldier
